passive.description: When using weapon skills or Basic Attacks to deal damage, applies an additional [Target Mark] to the target for 8s. When [Target Mark] stacks to 5 layers, it activates, dealing an extra [Damage Rate: 90%] Physical Damage, applying a 25% Slow for 2s, granting the caster 25% increased Movement Speed for 2s, extending the next 3 Basic Attack range by 3m for 6s. The damage is affected by Basic Attack Damage Boost and can critically strike based on Basic Attack Crit Rate.

basicAttacks.description: Replaces Basic Attack with [Split Arrow].Deals [Damage Rate: 80%] Physical Damage to up to 5enemies in a frontal cone

Replaces Basic Attack with [Piercing Arrow]. Fires an arrow forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 140%] Physical Damage to enemy targets along its path and reducing their Armor by 15 for 4 seconds. The arrow's range increases with charge time. When charged for 1 second, deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage and applies [Target Mark].

[Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 80%] PhysicalDamage to the target. Every 6th Basic Attack becomes [Venom Arrow].Deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage and inflictsVenom. [Venom]Deals [Damage Rate: 15%] Magic Damage every secondfor 6s. Stacks up to 3 times ..

commonSkills.description: Gains 10 Explosive Arrows for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks or skill arrows that hit enemies deal additional [Damage Rate: 40%] Physical Damage to up to 5 nearby enemies. Blast Arrows only apply [Target Mark] to the target that triggers the explosion.
Gains 10 Frost Arrows for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks and skill arrows deal [Damage Rate: 50%] additional Magic Damage and inflict 40% Slow for 2 seconds on hit.
Fires a sleep arrow forward while self-knockback 14m. Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage on first enemy hit and applies Sleep for 5 seconds.

Fires a Silencing Arrow in the target direction. The first enemy hit takes [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage. After 2s, it inflicts [Damage Rate: 180%] Magic Damage to enemies within 5m and applies Silence for 4s.

Fires three binding arrows forward. The first player hit byeach takes [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage([Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to mobs) and isImmobilized for 1.5s.Gains 1 charge every 14s, up to 2 charges.

skills.description: Rains arrows down at the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage to players([Damage Rate: 270%] Physical Damage to mobs) andinflicting 30% Slow for 3s.Gains 1 charge every 12s, up to 3 charges

Gains 18 Splintershots and +30% Attack Speed for 20 seconds. Each Basic Attack that hits an enemy fires 2 additional arrows, each dealing [Damage Rate: 30%] Magic Damage. Only the first arrow of each Splintershot applies [Target Mark].

Fires a Powershot in the target direction. When it hits the first enemy, it explodes, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage to up to 5 enemies in range and applying Stun. The damage increases with flight distance, up to a maximum of 2 times. The Stun duration also increases with flight distance, starting at 1 second and reaching a maximum of 3 seconds when the arrow flies to 80% of its maximum range. The explosion applies 3 stacks of [Target Mark].

Fires an Arcbolt in the target direction, which explodes on contact with enemies, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to enemies in range and attaching a Thunderstorm Field. The Thunderstorm Field lasts 8s, dealing [Damage Rate: 45%] Physical Damage every second to enemy targets within 6m, applying 10 Armor Reduction for 4s, up to 5 stacks. Explosion applies 3 stacks of [Target Mark].

Fires three Tempest Arrows forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage, reducing Attack Speed by35% for 4s, and knocking targets back 5m. Enemiesknocked into terrain are Stunned for 2.5s.When multiple arrows hit the same target, the damagefrom arrows beyond the first is reduced by 30%.

Shoots 3 Severance Shots in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to enemies hitalong the path, reducing their healing received by 20% for4s.When multiple Severance Shots hit the same target, thedamage of arrows beyond the first is reduced by 30%.Gains 1 charge every 12s, up to 3 charges

Fires a Shadow Vortex Arrow in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage to the first enemy hit and remaining on them. After 0.5 seconds, it converges, inflicting [Damage Rate: 280%] Magic Damage to enemies within a 7-meter radius, pulling them to the center, and applying 40% Slow for 3 seconds. It also applies 3 layers of Target Mark upon convergence. Gains 1 charge every 15 seconds, up to a maximum of 2 charges.
